abstract: The online marketplace will now allow its Prime members to download some movies and TV shows to iOS and Android devices to watch programming offline.
snippet: The online marketplace will now allow its Prime members to download some movies and TV shows to iOS and Android devices to watch programming offline.
lead_paragraph: Each Saturday, Farhad Manjoo and Mike Isaac, technology reporters at The New York Times, review the week’s news, offering analysis and maybe a joke or two about the most important developments in the industry. Mr. Manjoo is off this week, so Mr. Isaac is conversing with fellow tech reporter Quentin Hardy.

headline.main: Mike and Quentin’s Week in Tech: Amazon’s Offline Game Changer

byline.original: By Mike Isaac and Quentin Hardy
